name: FStaticMeshSourceModel
doc: Source model from which a renderable static mesh is built.

BuildSettings: Settings applied when building the mesh.
ReductionSettings: Reduction settings to apply when building render data.
ScreenSize:
ScreenSize to display this LOD.
The screen size is based around the projected diameter of the bounding
sphere of the model. i.e. 0.5 means half the screen's maximum dimension.
